modify_phosphines module¶

modify_phosphines.make_mod_phos_df(phos_df: DataFrame, mod: Callable) → DataFrame[source]¶

Returns a DataFrame of modified phosphines from a phosphine dataframe.

modify_phosphines.mod_phos_smiles(phos_smiles, mod: str) → str[source]¶

Modifies a phosphine and modifies it according to the input string.

modify_phosphines.phos_smiles_to_nico3_complex_smiles(phos_smiles: str) → str[source]¶

Takes SMILES string for phosphine and returns SMILES string for corresponding R3P-Ni(CO)3 complex.

modify_phosphines.phos_smiles_to_phos_oxide_smiles(phos_smiles: str) → str[source]¶

Takes SMILES string for phosphine and returns SMILES string for corresponding phosphine oxide.
